overview: Ethan began his 1st Startup, alongside Ilirijan Residovski and Nurlan Gurbanov when he was only 20 years old. Fast forward a few years and Ethan has now grown into co-founder and Product Manager of the Mobile development company SLM Technology. His drive and determination of connecting the world socially, locally, and mobiliy is evident with his pursuit to mobile rock star status. He is a perfect example of the transition of the Y generation, young, intelligent, and business savvy. If you need a good idea or product going into the mobile ring, you will have to get in line and schedule an appointment with everyone else, Don Drapper is a hard guy to pull away from his desk. His determination and innovation accented with a true Midwestern work ethic truly sets him apart from the rest. Fun and easy going, this madman is a get contribution to our team at SLM.
